{{also|Gestern}} ==German== ===Etymology=== Ultimately from {{der|de|gem-pro|*gestra-}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*dʰǵʰyes-}}. Compare English ''[[yesterday|yester(day)]]'', Dutch {{m|nl|gisteren}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈɡɛstərn/|/ˈɡɛstɐn/}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈɡɛstn/}} {{a|Mecklenburg-Vorpommern}} * {{audio|de|De-gestern.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{audio|de|De-at-gestern.ogg|audio (Austria)}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[yesterday]] ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|gestrig}} * {{l|de|von gestern}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} [[Category:de:Time]]
